[176] utilize fine-tuned GPT-2 to generate reasoning paths. StructGPT [67] utilizes LLMs to automatically invoke several pre-defined functions, by which relevant information can be retrieved and combined to assist further reasoning.
J. ACM, Vol. 37, No. 4, Article 111. Publication date: September 2024.
